sequence.Description: Sequence in used for the scan. Matches the bids-filename.

Levels.acq-pmcoff_run-01_dwi: DWI image (TRACEW and ADC), without pmc, still (no deliberate motion)
Levels.acq-pmcoff_run-02_dwi: DWI image (TRACEW and ADC), without pmc, deliberate nod motion
Levels.acq-pmcon_run-01_dwi: DWI image (TRACEW and ADC), with pmc, still (no deliberate motion)
Levels.acq-pmcon_run-02_dwi: DWI image (TRACEW and ADC), with pmc, deliberate nod motion

neuroradiologist_rank.Description: Rank as determined by the neuroradiologist. Ranks range from 1 to 4, with 1 being the lowest quality and 4 the highest. Ties are resolved by assigning the minimum rank of the tie to all tied scans. TraceW and ADC images were both considered equally.
